title: Futuristic Font ID for CALIFORNIA
content:
Hello,

I'm looking for the font that is used for the word CALIFORNIA.

Thank you.

Font: 

 Handel Gothic 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131830/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [logo.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131830/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_58.png) | 5.45 KB |
author: eMarketingBull

comments.content: I'd probably try to start with [Handel Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317131830/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/handel+gothic) even if I suspect it could be a commercial font as the main one.
